title: SIUNU (NU University System)
desc: A unified academic ecosystem for NU Universities across Indonesia. Integrates student admissions, scholarship management, and digital journals into one seamless platform.

title: POSTALSIAR (Gov Datamart)
desc: A strategic Datamart for the Ministry of Communication (Komdigi). Visualizes critical data across Postal, Telecommunication, and Broadcasting sectors for state-owned enterprises.

title: Tax Decisions Archive
desc: An intelligent legal database housing over 90,000 tax decision documents. Features a high-performance deep search engine capable of indexing specific keywords within PDF files.
